segments.text: Yeah . It's been raining a lot these days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have been watching a lot of videos at home because of the constant rain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you heard when it's supposed to get better ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I saw the weather report , and it's going to rain for the next eight days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sucks so much . What are we going to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm getting pretty bored . We should do something despite the rain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm with you . What do you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I haven't been to the Mall in a long time . Let's go there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds good . They have a movie theatre there , so if we get bored , we can watch a movie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . I'll stop by your place now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . Don't forget to bring your umbrella . The rain can start up again anytime .
segments.speaker: S2
